attributes.action: Use taxes raised on road tax and fuel duty to help the enviroment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Some of this money should be put into a fund that helps people to invest in renewable energy at home by means of grants of upto 90% of cost, because most people want it but can not afford it, this would also help in the long term to cut emitions from power stations because you would cut the amount needed. all new build private homes and commercial must have some renewable energy fitted by law.buildings to have solar power fitted at a min standard the rest of this money should then go into public transport to make it user friendly instead of a revinue builder for the operator. there needs a fixed price for all journys on trains/bus/tram and it must be less than what a car would be able to do it for, and there must be a min standard for the quality of equipment and time table with all areas covered in towns and country. All companys must stick to this standard because we as the traveling public are not getting value for the money we are spending.
